typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Risk_Sub_Class as string,
		Risk_Class as string,
		Risk_Description as string,
		Actions_and_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as integer,
		Severity as integer,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as integer,
		Residual_Severity as integer,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Process_Name as string,
		CurrentReportingPeriod as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Class,
		Risk_Description,
		Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as short,
		Severity as short,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as short,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as short,
		Residual_Severity as short,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as short,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Risk_Opp_Class as string,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton = Risk_Description,
		Actions_Controls = Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate = Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class = Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Opp_Class = Risk_Class
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
